headline: We All Got Here From Somewhere
abstract: “Cartography,” a multimedia work inspired by migrants’ stories, presents their journeys as universal and heroic, not merely tales of suffering.
lead_paragraph: Kaneza Schaal and Christopher Myers were in Munich, Germany, a few years ago, working with some of that city’s many migrant children, when they led them in a storytelling exercise: making sound portraits of the places they came from.
